name: Particle Attraction
description:
Top down shooter where your goal is a high score. Attract particles for bonus multiplier and repel them into enemies!

Created in about 4 days for a jam.

If you have input problems refresh the page.

Story

You are inside the Large Hadron Collider.

There is no story because we did not have time.

REMEMBER: Opposites Attract. Don't explode.

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Left click to shoot
  • Right click to reverse polarity
Theme

Opposites Attract: Our first idea for Xander Jam 4 was "magnets" and we used it. We didn't have an artist and none of us can draw so we decided to make the game with simple shapes. And a lot of explosions. What has more explosions than the inside of a particle accelerator?

Switch: We noticed GeoJam 2021 was happening the same time as Xander Jam. Both starting and ending at the same time, and our game fitting both themes. Both hosts were ok with entering the same game so we did.
